biocontainers.name: bitseq
biocontainers.summary: This package is targeted for transcript expression analysis and de analysis of rna-seq data in a two-stage process. in the first stage it uses bayesian methodology to infer expression of individual transcripts from individual rna-seq experiments. the second stage embraces the de analysis of transcript expression by providing expression estimates from replicates of multiple conditions.

biotools.summary: This package is targeted for transcript expression analysis and DE analysis of RNA-seq data in a two-stage process. In the first stage it uses Bayesian methodology to infer expression of individual transcripts from individual RNA-seq experiments. The second stage embraces the DE analysis of transcript expression by providing expression estimates from replicates of multiple conditions.

bioschemas.name: BitSeq
bioschemas.summary: This package is targeted for transcript expression analysis and DE analysis of RNA-seq data in a two-stage process. In the first stage it uses Bayesian methodology to infer expression of individual transcripts from individual RNA-seq experiments. The second stage embraces the DE analysis of transcript expression by providing expression estimates from replicates of multiple conditions.
